name: workscript
description: A monorepo template built with Bun, Hono, Vite, and React
author: Steve Simkins

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "SHARED,SERVER,CLIENT" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,green" "bun run dev:shared" "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:client"
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server && bun run build:client
scripts.postinstall: bun run build:shared && bun run build:server
scripts.test: bun run test:shared && bun run test:server
